summaryAsHtml: Learn how to set your environment up from scratch, develop a simple app, test it, integrating CSS frameworks (Angular Material or Bootstrap), secure it with Stormpath, and deploy it to the cloud. Could even turn it into a PWA if there's time.
title: The Ultimate Getting Started with Angular Workshop
summary: Learn how to set your environment up from scratch, develop a simple app, test it, integrating CSS frameworks (Angular Material or Bootstrap), secure it with Stormpath, and deploy it to the cloud. Could even turn it into a PWA if there's time.
